title: Pirate
summaries: The Pirate is a Hardmode NPC vendor who appears almost the same as the Pirate Captain, an enemy from the Pirate Invasion. He will move in once the following criteria have been met:

• There is an available vacant house.
  • The Pirate Invasion event has been completed at least once.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, he will defend himself using his gun, which fires both bullets and cannonballs, similar to the Pirate Captain enemy.
